general_info.summary: This entry provides a source URL for information about a Bachelor of Arts (Honors) in English with Research program offered by Sharda University.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a humanities and social sciences course, including roles in publishing (writing, proofreading, editing), media and journalism, digital writing and marketing, and human resources/public relations. It encourages individuals to pursue these career avenues.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Publishing – Writing, Proof Reading, Editing
• Media and Journalism
• Digital Writing and Marketing
• Human Resource & Public Relations
Take the next step towards a career in humanities & social sciences.
